Text: How do you open/copy flac, not sure how to do this any help greatly appreciated thank you

mous1 - You can use Winamp to play flac files. Just search for it and you`ll find it. If you want to play them in Windows Media player you need to download the codecs and the tag extender. The links for them are:-
Tag support for WMP

http://www.softpointer.com/downloads/WMPTagSupport11.exe

and the codec

http://www.illiminable.com/ogg/

Download them and install them.
drone1969, thank you for your help
There is also a patch you can get (can't remember where, it's been so long) so you can burn .flacs into a regular CD.
You are a Hwkhero, and so is everyone who seeds this.
